ygData.subject: Re: Farewell
ygData.msgSnippet: I bought 1 liao. A guy was selling it for 300pp. so now I totally broke again. ... From: Sereph  To:  Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
I bought 1 liao. A guy was selling it for 300pp.
so now I totally broke again.
----- Original Message -----
From: Sereph <garford@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>

Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Farewell
